# iosxr_radius_source_interface (Data Source)

This data source can read the Radius Source Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_radius_source_interface" "example" {
  vrf = "VRF1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vrf` (String) VRF for this source interface configuration

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in RADIUS packets
